#### Aerospace Assembly & Coating {#coat-indcom-aero_assembly}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-aero_assembly-setup}
AERO_ASSEMBLY_CATEGORIES <- c(
  "#278 Plastic Parts & Prod. Ctg." = 278,
  "#279 Plastic Parts & Prod. C/U" = 279) # "C/U" means "cleanup solvent"
```

##### History {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-aero_assembly-annual_emissions-chart}
BY2011_annual_emission_data %>%
  filter_categories(
    AERO_ASSEMBLY_CATEGORIES) %>%
  chart_BY2011_annual_emissions_by(
    fill = category) 
```
